member.name: T:Starksoft.Net.Proxy.HttpProxyClient
member.summary:
HTTP connection proxy class. This class implements the HTTP standard proxy protocol.
You can use this class to set up a connection to an HTTP proxy server. Calling the CreateConnection() method initiates the proxy connection and returns a standard System.Net.Socks.TcpClient object that can be used as normal. The proxy plumbing is all handled for you.

member.name: T:Starksoft.Net.Proxy.IProxyClient
member.summary: Proxy client interface. This is the interface that all proxy clients must implement.

member.name: M:Starksoft.Net.Proxy.IProxyClient.CreateConnection(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a remote TCP connection through a proxy server to the destination host on the destination port.
member.param: Destination host name or IP address.
Port number to connect to on the destination host.
member.returns: Returns an open TcpClient object that can be used normally to communicate with the destination server
member.remarks: This method creates a connection to the proxy server and instructs the proxy server to make a pass through connection to the specified destination host on the specified port.

member.name: M:Starksoft.Net.Proxy.IProxyClient.CreateConnectionAsync(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Asynchronously creates a remote TCP connection through a proxy server to the destination host on the destination port.
member.param: Destination host name or IP address.
Port number to connect to on the destination host.
member.returns: Returns an open TcpClient object that can be used normally to communicate with the destination server
member.remarks: This method creates a connection to the proxy server and instructs the proxy server to make a pass through connection to the specified destination host on the specified port.

member.name: E:Starksoft.Net.Proxy.IProxyClient.CreateConnectionAsyncCompleted
member.summary: Event handler for CreateConnectionAsync method completed.

member.name: T:Starksoft.Net.Proxy.Socks4aProxyClient
member.summary: Socks4a connection proxy class. This class implements the Socks4a standard proxy protocol which is an extension of the Socks4 protocol
member.remarks: In Socks version 4A if the client cannot resolve the destination host's domain name to find its IP address the server will attempt to resolve it.

member.name: T:Starksoft.Net.Proxy.Socks4ProxyClient
member.summary: Socks4 connection proxy class. This class implements the Socks4 standard proxy protocol.
member.remarks: This class implements the Socks4 proxy protocol standard for TCP communciations.

member.summary: Default Socks4 proxy port.

member.summary: Socks4 connection command value.

member.summary: Socks4 bind command value.

member.summary: Socks4 reply request grant response value.

member.summary: Socks4 reply request rejected or failed response value.

member.summary: Socks4 reply request rejected becauase the proxy server can not connect to the IDENTD server value.

member.name: F:Starksoft.Net.Proxy.Socks4ProxyClient.SOCKS4_CMD_REPLY_REQUEST_REJECTED_DIFFERENT_IDENTD
member.summary: Socks4 reply request rejected because of a different IDENTD server.

member.name: M:Starksoft.Net.Proxy.Socks4ProxyClient.CreateConnection(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a TCP connection to the destination host through the proxy server host.
member.param: Destination host name or IP address of the destination server.
Port number to connect to on the destination server.
member.returns: Returns an open TcpClient object that can be used normally to communicate with the destination server
member.remarks: This method creates a connection to the proxy server and instructs the proxy server to make a pass through connection to the specified destination host on the specified port.

member.summary: Sends a command to the proxy server.

IDENTD user ID value.

member.summary: Translate the host name or IP address to a byte array.

member.returns: Byte array representing IP address in bytes.

member.summary: Translate the destination port value to a byte array.

member.returns: Byte array representing an 16 bit port number as two bytes.

member.summary: Receive a byte array from the proxy server and determine and handle and errors that may have occurred.

member.summary: Cancels any asychronous operation that is currently active.

member.name: M:Starksoft.Net.Proxy.Socks4ProxyClient.CreateConnectionAsync(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Asynchronously creates a remote TCP connection through a proxy server to the destination host on the destination port using the supplied open TcpClient object with an open connection to proxy server.
member.param: Destination host name or IP address.
Port number to connect to on the destination host.
member.returns: Returns TcpClient object that can be used normally to communicate with the destination server.
member.remarks: This instructs the proxy server to make a pass through connection to the specified destination host on the specified port.

member.name: M:Starksoft.Net.Proxy.Socks4aProxyClient.SendCommand(System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream,System.Byte,System.String,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Sends a command to the proxy server.
member.param: Proxy server data stream.
Proxy byte command to execute.
Destination host name or IP address.
Destination port number
IDENTD user ID value.
member.remarks: This method override the SendCommand message in the Sock4ProxyClient object. The override adds support for the Socks4a extensions which allow the proxy client to optionally command the proxy server to resolve the destination host IP address.

member.summary: Gets String representing the name of the proxy.
member.remarks: This property will always return the value 'SOCKS4a'
